section.div: Favorites genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Action, Mecha, Drama, Romance

div.div:
I saw something in that girl from my class that she "didn't want anyone else to see..."
Mizuki is a cute, bright, and popular girl. She is devoted to caring for her sick mother and seems like the perfect "good girl" in every way. Until Unno saw Mizuki in a situation she shouldn't have......? What happens when you try to escape from reality? A road movie about sad girls.

(Source: Comic Bridge, translated)
Sasayaku You ni Koi wo Utau

Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and to Himari's surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what "love" really means... (Source: Kodansha USA) Notes: - Eighteenth place of Tsugimanga 2020 Award in the Manga Category - First place in Yuri Navi’s best Yuri Manga of 2020
